526180.name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided™ - VR Experience
526180.description: Discover four iconic environments from Deus Ex: Mankind Divided, for the first time in virtual reality. Take in the stunning level of detail of locations from Dubai and Golem City, as well as Adam Jensen’s apartment, powered by the Dawn Engine and the franchise’s renowned art direction. The Deus Ex VR Experience also lets you examine up-close a selection of 3D models of main characters and NPCs from the game.
526180.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
